ygData.subject: Re: Sad story, Questions, ***SPOILER ***, Laugh
ygData.msgSnippet: To BIND OTHERS you have to be INSIDE the city ZONE, so if you go INTO the gnome city it will work.  You can bind yourself anyway though. Feelwithe and Keletin
ygData.messageBody:
To BIND OTHERS you have to be INSIDE the city ZONE, so if you go INTO the
gnome city it will work. You can bind yourself anyway though.
Feelwithe and Keletin are exceptions. I think because Kelethin is IN GF
ZONE. and Felwithe you have to be right out front.
I know this cus same thing happened to me, and when I went INTO the Gnome
city the BIND on the other person took fine.


> Question 3:
> When I was still 12th level I cast Bind on myself and my friend. I got a
> message that I feel bound to the area (or something like that). My friend
> did not. I cast it on him 4 times and he did not get that message. I
tried
> to cast it by the gnome city if that matters. The only message that I got
> was that I had started to cast a spell. When we died, I appeared near the
> gnome city and he had a much longer walk. It appears that the bind did
not
> work for him.


Any ORC that is close to or higher than you LVL will attack you and try to
kill you. Especially if you are Meditating.
Once you are high enough lvl they will leave you alone.

> Another Story:
> I have mostly been fighting in Crushbone, so my standing with the orcs
> really sucks. Sometimes a legionaire or slaver will attack me without me
> attacking them and the "tanks" have been totally unable to pull them off
> while I am standing and trying to move away. I don't think that the
"tanks"
> are at the top of the orcs most wanted list like I am. If it matters, I
> helped kill Crush with a large party.
>
